meanings.definition: The act of selling something that has already been purchased.
meanings.sent1: I made a profit from the resale of my old bike.
meanings.sent2: The resale value of the car dropped significantly after a year.
meanings.sent3: At the garage sale, the resale of the vintage toys was a hit with collectors.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for negotiation made her the queen of resale in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The resale market for designer handbags is always booming.

meanings.definition: The price at which something is sold again.
meanings.sent1: The resale of the concert tickets was higher than the original price.
meanings.sent2: He bought the painting at a low price for resale at a profit.
meanings.sent3: The resale of the limited edition sneakers caused a bidding war online.
meanings.sent4: The resale value of the antique clock surprised the appraiser.
meanings.sent5: She set a new record with the resale of her artwork at the auction.
